text: A national museum is a museum that is kept by a nation. The following is a list of national museums: ==Argentina== * Argentine National Museum of History ==Australia== *Australian National Aviation Museum *Australian National Maritime Museum *Australian Tennis Museum , Sydney *Australian War Memorial *Museum Victoria *National Alpine Museum *National Gallery of Australia *National Gallery of Victoria *National Motor Museum Australia *National
